divs: Sighting DetailsI sropped by a friends home that lives quite close to me on the way home to my own house. She has a longish walk from parking to her front door. Beautiful semi-clear night and enjoying sky with some whispy high clouds. Noticed an satelite and stopped to enjoy its flight across night sky. Became slightly obscured by high clouds and reappeared in diagonal trajectory. Thought it was optical illustion. Continued to watch and several seconds later it "darted" off at 45 degree angel. Thats it. Nothing sectacular but hey unidentified and very unusuall! Thanks, Jessa
Summary: THoght to be a satalite with unusual movement observed
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Silverdale
There were no other sightings in Silverdale on or around August 2nd 2011
